history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> Do you need parking information around UPMC Presby campus?
USER no
TTS <speak> Alright. <break strength='strong' /> Hope I can help you with parking next time. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS
TTS
TTS <speak> Are you looking for a doctor's office?
USER no
TTS <speak> Alright. <break strength='strong' /> You can try finding out a doctor's office with us next time. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS
TTS
TTS <speak> I can also help with trip planning. <break strength='strong'/> Do you want public transit directions or driving directions
USER yes
TTS <speak> I can also help with trip planning. <break strength='strong'/> Do you want public transit directions or driving directions
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER UPMC
TTS Okay, going to upmc presbyterian. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER Squirrel Hill
TTS Okay, leaving from squirrel hill north. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER tomorrow
TTS Okay, travelling at 07:01 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER no
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 22 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
